short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent unwanted websites to appear in your Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of the extension is to remove undesired websites from search queries. It's a Proof Of Concept (POC) with a major e-commerce provider.
